mapper.select: select PROD_NUM, PROD_NAME, product.BRAND_NUM, brand.BRAND_NAME, PROD_IMG, PRICE, PSIZE FROM product, brand WHERE product.BRAND_NUM=brand.BRAND_NUM
select PROD_NUM, PROD_NAME, product.BRAND_NUM, brand.BRAND_NAME, PROD_IMG, PRICE, PSIZE FROM product, brand WHERE PROD_NUM=#{PROD_NUM} AND product.BRAND_NUM=brand.BRAND_NUM
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT (PROD_NUM, PROD_NAME, PSIZE, STOCK, BRAND_NUM, CATE_COD, PROD_IMG, PRICE) VALUES(#{PROD_NUM}, #{PROD_NAME}, #{PSIZE}, 20, #{BRAND_NUM}, #{CATE_COD}, #{PROD_IMG}, #{PRICE})
